name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. BAILEY, Petitioner; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. Bailey, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. BAILEY, Petitioner. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. Bailey, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of February, 2014, the Petition for Bail and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
86 A.3d 230
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. BAILEY, Petitioner. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael A. Bailey, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 26, 2014.
